title: Lowest Crop Production Index
description: In 2022, Malta had the lowest crop production index in the world, with a value of 53.79 (2014-2016 = 100).

title: Highest Energy Imports
description: In 2022, Malta had the highest net energy imports in the world, accounting for 389.55% of its energy use.

title: Lowest Methane Emissions from Energy
description: In 2015, Malta had the lowest methane emissions from fugitive emissions in the energy sector, with only 0.0001 Mt CO2e.
